name: Heroku + Platform Events Quick Start for Salesforce ISV's, Heroku Listener Component
description: Sample application to consume Platform Events from Salesforce

SF_CLIENT_ID.description: Consumer key of the Salesforce Connected App

SF_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Consumer secret of the Salesforce Connected App

SF_USER_NAME.description: Salesforce username for the integration user

SF_USER_PASSWORD.description: Salesforce password for the integration user

SF_SECURITY_TOKEN.description: Salesforce security token for the integration user
